ygData.subject: RE: A Real Topic!
ygData.msgSnippet: Every time I saw the hero, he was around 35+. But he hits much harder !!! You don t need to do the quest in Kerra Isle. It is just another way to raise
ygData.messageBody:
Every time I saw the hero, he was around 35+. But he hits much harder !!!
You don't need to do the quest in Kerra Isle. It is just another way to
raise faction. But it may have an important impact so do it if you can. I
know people who got the bracer without doing it.
Remember that just amiably is not enough. You need to be high amiably to
succeed.

Tsin Suchiko
41th rank, Tunare.


-----Original Message-----
From: imari_dellimore@... [mailto:imari_dellimore@...]
Sent: Monday, February 14, 2000 7:27 AM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re:[EQ-Monks] A Real Topic!


From: imari_dellimore@...


Mino hero is level 40ish. you will need a full group of 35s to take him down
(
you and 5 level 35-40 friends). A level 39 necro could take him down solo
with
some difficulty. Depending on the server you play on he could be camped and
so
you might want to bring a good NUKE along to ensure you earn the kill.

The first thing to do is raise qeynos warrior guild faction. Wiat let me
take
that back... the first thing to do is go to www.gameznet.com and print out
the
walk through for the quest. You have to do a silly quest to kerra isle
before
you can get the hero bracer quest, and you have to con amiable before you
can
get any quests at all.

Lastly one trick you wil want to know is *how do I make the mino hero
spawn?*
Well rumor has it that if you kill minos and skeleton by the skelie camp he
will
spawn in a matter of minutes (people have gotten 2 spawns an hour with this
method).

Take the shakle off the mino + faction with the warrior guild + complete the
first "runaway gladiator" quest, and you will get one hero bracers 9ac, 10
str,
5 poison, 5 disease.

Good luck
